code: import{useMemo}from"react";export const useSortedPosts=(posts,sort)=>{const sortedPosts=useMemo(()=>{if(sort){return[...posts].sort((a,b)=>a[sort].localeCompare(b[sort]));}return posts;},[sort,posts]);return sortedPosts;};export const usePosts=(posts,sort,query)=>{const sortedPosts=useSortedPosts(posts,sort);const sortedAndSearchePosts=useMemo(()=>{return sortedPosts.filter(post=>post.title.toLowerCase().includes(query));},[query,sortedPosts]);return sortedAndSearchePosts;};
